answers.text:
Hi Rafael, 
Thank you for the interesting question! I hope others with first hand experience are able to add to the resources I have included below. 
-This document discusses a solar hot water heater system that was installed and lists the company. I would encourage you to contact the local government and the installer to learn from them the types of grants they use and how the solar installers typically help their customers make the solar hot water heaters affordable. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/301642
-The City of Durham, NC is using solar hot water heaters on their fire station and they may be another good local government for you to contact directly since it seems like the projects would require similar grants. http://icma.org/en/Article/101106/Durham_NC_Using__Solar_Energy_in_City_Fire_Stations
I hope you are able to reach one to these local governments and they others are able to help provide you with answers as well. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Rafael Baptista
text:
As part of my internship, I am looking for potential funding sources for a system to use solar power to heat water in the county jail. I have looked at many federal grants and they do not seem to be a good match. Does anyone have any ideas of possible federal or private grants? 
Thank you
Rafael
title: Grants for Solar Water Heating System
